#summary Overview introduction to the DwC-germplasm terms
#labels TERMS

= DwC-germplasm TERMS =

<img src='http://darwincore-germplasm.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/illustrations/crop_descriptors.jpg' align='right' />

The terms of the Darwin Core extension for genebanks (DwC-germplasm) are grouped by class for improved overview. The grouping class is not a normative part of the DwC-germplasm, and only used here for improved readability.

    * [DatasetTerms Dataset]
    * [TaxonTerms Taxon]
    * [SpecimenTerms Specimen (Accession)]
    * [CollectingEventTerms Collecting Event]
    * [BreedingEventTerms Breeding Event]
    * [SafetyDuplicationTerms Safety Duplication]
    * [TraitMeasurementTerms Trait Measurements (C&E)]
    * [TreatiesAndRegulationsTerms Treaties and Regulations]

    * [DistributionTerms Distribution - PROPOSED]
    * [ConservationTraitsTerms Conservation traits - PROPOSED]
